      public boolean isConsistent(Integer wordSize)
      Returns whether all NGrams in this builder have the given wordSize.
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if wordSize is null.

    • build

      public Corpus build()
      Builds a new Corpus if all NGrams share the same word size; otherwise throws an IllegalStateException.
